00032 #ifndef HAL_AVR_H
00033 #define HAL_AVR_H
00034 /*============================ INCLUDE =======================================*/
00035 #include <stdint.h>
00036 #include "stdbool.h"
00037 #include <avr/io.h>
00038 #include <avr/interrupt.h>
00039 #include <util/crc16.h>
00040 #include <util/delay.h>
00041 #include <avr/eeprom.h>
00042 #include "rum_types.h"
00043 
00063 #define RCB230     1  
00064 #define RCB231     2  
00065 #define RCB212     3  
00066 #define RCBSIP     4
00067 #define RAVEN      5  
00068 #define RAVENUSB   6  
00069 #define SPITFIRE   7  
00070 #define ZIGBIT9    8  
00071 #define ZIGBIT24   9  
00072 #define DSK001    10  
00073 
00086 #define BAND900    1
00087 #define BAND2400   2
00088 
00090 #if defined DOXYGEN
00091 
00096     #define PLATFORM RCB231
00097     #define F_CPU 8000000UL
00098 #endif
00099 
00100 /* RCB with 231 Device */
00101 #if PLATFORM==RCB231
00102         #ifndef __AVR_ATmega1281__
00103                 #error "Incorrect MCU for Platform! Check Makefile"
00104         #endif
00105 
00106         // 1281 RF231
00113         #   define SSPORT     B          
00114         #   define SSPIN      (0x00)     
00115         #   define SPIPORT    B          
00116         #   define MOSIPIN    (0x02)     
00117         #   define MISOPIN    (0x03)     
00118         #   define SCKPIN     (0x01)     
00119         #   define RSTPORT    B          
00120         #   define RSTPIN     (0x05)     
00121         #   define SLPTRPORT  B          
00122         #   define SLPTRPIN   (0x04)     
00123         #   define USART      1          
00124         #   define ADPORT     F          
00125         #   define ADPIN      (0x00)     
00126         #   define DIDR       DIDR0      
00127         #   define TICKTIMER  3          
00128         #   define RADIO_VECT INT0_vect  
00129 
00130         #   define HAL_ENABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) EICRA |= 3, EIMSK |= 1
00132         #   define HAL_DISABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) EICRA &= ~3, EIMSK &= ~1
00133 
00135         #   define HAL_INIT_ADC() DIDR0 |= (1 << ADPIN), ADMUX = 0xC0 | ADPIN, ADCSRA = 0x84
00137         #   define HAL_STOP_ADC() ADCSRA &= ~0x80
00139         #   define HAL_SAMPLE_ADC() ADCSRA |= (1 << ADSC) | (1<< ADIF)
00141         #   define HAL_WAIT_ADC() while (!(ADCSRA & (1<<ADIF))) {;}; ADCSRA |= (1<<ADIF);
00143         #   define HAL_READ_ADC() ADC
00144         #   define BAND BAND2400
00145 
00146         // LED Macros
00147         #define LED_INIT() (DDRE |= ((1<<2) | (1<<3) | (1<<4)), PORTE |= ((1<<2) | (1<<3) | (1<<4)))
00148         // LED_ON(led), where led = 1-3
00149         #define LED_ON(led) (PORTE &= ~(1 << (led+1)))
00150         #define LED_OFF(led) (PORTE |= 1 << (led+1))
00151 
00152         // Button macros
00153         #define BUTTON_SETUP()                  DDRE &= ~(1 << PE5), PORTE |= (1 << PE5)
00154         #define BUTTON_PRESSED() (DDRE &= ~0x20, PORTE |= 0x20, !(PINE & 0x20))
00155 
00159 /* RCB with 231/1284 Device on SIP chip */
00160 #elif PLATFORM==RCBSIP
00161         #ifndef __AVR_ATmega1284P__
00162                 #error "Incorrect MCU for Platform! Check Makefile"
00163         #endif
00164 
00165         // 1284 RF231
00166         #   define SSPORT     B
00167         #   define SSPIN      (0x04)
00168         #   define SPIPORT    B
00169         #   define MOSIPORT   B
00170         #   define MOSIPIN    (0x05)
00171         #   define MISOPIN    (0x06)
00172         #   define SCKPORT    B
00173         #   define SCKPIN     (0x07)
00174         #   define RSTPORT    B
00175         #   define RSTPIN     (0x02)
00176         #   define SLPTRPORT  B
00177         #   define SLPTRPIN   (0x03)
00178         #   define USART      1
00179         #   define RADIO_VECT TIMER1_CAPT_vect
00180         #   define TICKTIMER  3
00181         #   define HAL_ENABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) ( TIMSK1 |= ( 1 << ICIE1 ) ),  \
00182                         TCCR1B = HAL_TCCR1B_CONFIG,   /* Set clock prescaler */ \
00183                         TIFR1 |= (1 << ICF1)        /* Clear Input Capture Flag. */
00184         #   define HAL_DISABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) ( TIMSK1 &= ~( 1 << ICIE1 ), TCCR1B = 0)
00185         #   define PB0 0
00186         #   define PD4 4
00187         #   define PC0 0
00188         #   define PC4 4
00189         #   define PC6 6
00190         #   define PC7 7
00191         #   define HAL_INIT_ADC()
00192         #   define HAL_STOP_ADC()
00193         #   define HAL_SAMPLE_ADC()
00194         #   define HAL_WAIT_ADC()
00195         #   define HAL_READ_ADC() 0
00196         #   define BAND BAND2400
00197 
00198         // LED Macros
00199         #define LED_INIT()              DDRD |= (1 << PD4), PORTD |= ~(1 << PD4)
00200         // LED_ON(led), where led = 1-3
00201         #define LED_ON(led)             DDRD |= (1 << PD4), PORTD &= ~(1 << PD4)
00202         #define LED_OFF(led)            DDRD &= ~(1 << PD4), PORTD |= (1 << PD4)
00203 
00204         // Button macros
00205         #define BUTTON_SETUP()          DDRB &= ~(1 << PB0), PORTB |= (1 << PB0)
00206         #define BUTTON_PRESSED()        (!(PINB & (1 << PB0)))
00207 
00208 /* RCB with 230 Device */
00209 #elif PLATFORM==RCB230
00210 
00211         #ifndef __AVR_ATmega1281__
00212                 #error "Incorrect MCU for Platform! Check Makefile"
00213         #endif
00214 
00215 // 1281 RF230 rev B
00216         #   define SSPORT     B
00217         #   define SSPIN      (0x00)
00218         #   define SPIPORT    B
00219         #   define MOSIPIN    (0x02)
00220         #   define MISOPIN    (0x03)
00221         #   define SCKPIN     (0x01)
00222         #   define RSTPORT    B
00223         #   define RSTPIN     (0x05)
00224         #   define SLPTRPORT  B
00225         #   define SLPTRPIN   (0x04)
00226         #   define USART      1
00227         #   define ADPORT     F
00228         #   define ADPIN      (0x00)
00229         #   define DIDR       DIDR0
00230         #   define TICKTIMER  3
00231         #   define RADIO_VECT TIMER1_CAPT_vect
00232         #   define HAL_ENABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) ( TIMSK1 |= ( 1 << ICIE1 ) ),  \
00233                         TCCR1B = HAL_TCCR1B_CONFIG,   /* Set clock prescaler */ \
00234                         TIFR1 |= (1 << ICF1)        /* Clear Input Capture Flag. */
00235         #   define HAL_DISABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) ( TIMSK1 &= ~( 1 << ICIE1 ), TCCR1B = 0 )
00236         #   define HAL_INIT_ADC() DIDR0 |= (1 << ADPIN), ADMUX = 0xC0 | ADPIN, ADCSRA = 0x80
00237         #   define HAL_STOP_ADC()  ADCSRA &= ~0x80
00238         #   define HAL_SAMPLE_ADC() ADCSRA |= (1 << ADSC)
00239         #   define HAL_WAIT_ADC() while (!(ADCSRA & (1<<ADIF))) {;}; ADCSRA |= (1<<ADIF)
00240         #   define HAL_READ_ADC() ADC
00241         #   define BAND BAND2400
00242 
00243         // LED Macros
00244         #define LED_INIT() (DDRE |= ((1<<2) | (1<<3) | (1<<4)), PORTE |= ((1<<2) | (1<<3) | (1<<4)))
00245         // LED_ON(led), where led = 1-3
00246         #define LED_ON(led) (PORTE &= ~(1 << (led+1)))
00247         #define LED_OFF(led) (PORTE |= 1 << (led+1))
00248 
00249         // Button macros
00250         #define BUTTON_SETUP()                  DDRE &= ~(1 << PE5), PORTE |= (1 << PE5)
00251         #define BUTTON_PRESSED() (DDRE &= ~0x20, PORTE |= 0x20, !(PINE & 0x20))
00252 
00253 
00254 /* RCB with 212 Device */
00255 #elif PLATFORM==RCB212
00256 
00257         #ifndef __AVR_ATmega1281__
00258                 #error "Incorrect MCU for Platform! Check Makefile"
00259         #endif
00260 
00261         #   define SSPORT     B
00262         #   define SSPIN      (0x00)
00263         #   define SPIPORT    B
00264         #   define MOSIPIN    (0x02)
00265         #   define MISOPIN    (0x03)
00266         #   define SCKPIN     (0x01)
00267         #   define RSTPORT    B
00268         #   define RSTPIN     (0x05)
00269         #   define SLPTRPORT  B
00270         #   define SLPTRPIN   (0x04)
00271         #   define USART      1
00272         #   define ADPORT     F
00273         #   define ADPIN      (0x00)
00274         #   define DIDR       DIDR0
00275         #   define TICKTIMER  3
00276         #   define RADIO_VECT INT0_vect
00277         #   define HAL_ENABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) EICRA |= 3, EIMSK |= 1
00278         #   define HAL_DISABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) EICRA &= ~3, EIMSK &= ~1
00279         #   define HAL_INIT_ADC() DIDR0 |= (1 << ADPIN), ADMUX = 0xC0 | ADPIN, ADCSRA = 0x84
00280         #   define HAL_STOP_ADC() ADCSRA &= ~0x80
00281         #   define HAL_SAMPLE_ADC() ADCSRA |= (1 << ADSC) | (1<< ADIF)
00282         #   define HAL_WAIT_ADC() while (!(ADCSRA & (1<<ADIF))) {;}; ADCSRA |= (1<<ADIF)
00283         #   define HAL_READ_ADC() ADC
00284         #   define BAND BAND900    // RF212 RCB
00285 
00286         // LED Macros
00287         #define LED_INIT() (DDRE |= ((1<<2) | (1<<3) | (1<<4)), PORTE |= ((1<<2) | (1<<3) | (1<<4)))
00288         // LED_ON(led), where led = 1-3
00289         #define LED_ON(led) (PORTE &= ~(1 << (led+1)))
00290         #define LED_OFF(led) (PORTE |= 1 << (led+1))
00291 
00292         // Button macros
00293         #define BUTTON_SETUP()                  DDRE &= ~(1 << PE5), PORTE |= (1 << PE5)
00294         #define BUTTON_PRESSED() (DDRE &= ~0x20, PORTE |= 0x20, !(PINE & 0x20))

00297 /* Atmel Raven */
00298 #elif PLATFORM==RAVEN
00299 
00300         #ifndef __AVR_ATmega1284P__
00301                 #error "Incorrect MCU for Platform! Check Makefile"
00302         #endif
00303 
00304         /* 1284 raven */
00305         #   define SSPORT     B
00306         #   define SSPIN      (0x04)
00307         #   define SPIPORT    B
00308         #   define MOSIPIN    (0x05)
00309         #   define MISOPIN    (0x06)
00310         #   define SCKPIN     (0x07)
00311         #   define RSTPORT    B
00312         #   define RSTPIN     (0x01)
00313         #   define SLPTRPORT  B
00314         #   define SLPTRPIN   (0x03)
00315         #   define USART      0
00316         #   define TICKTIMER  3
00317         #   define HAS_SPARE_TIMER
00318         #   define RADIO_VECT TIMER1_CAPT_vect
00319         #   define HAL_ENABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) ( TIMSK1 |= ( 1 << ICIE1 ) ),  \
00320                         TCCR1B = HAL_TCCR1B_CONFIG,   /* Set clock prescaler */ \
00321                         TIFR1 |= (1 << ICF1)        /* Clear Input Capture Flag. */
00322         #   define HAL_DISABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) ( TIMSK1 &= ~( 1 << ICIE1 ) )
00323                    // Raven's 1284 has no analog connections
00324         #   define HAL_INIT_ADC()
00325         #   define HAL_STOP_ADC()
00326         #   define HAL_SAMPLE_ADC()
00327         #   define HAL_WAIT_ADC()
00328         #   define HAL_READ_ADC() ADC
00329         #   define BAND BAND2400
00330         #   define PC4 4
00331         #   define PC6 6
00332         #   define PC7 7
00333 
00334         // LED Macros
00335         #define LED_INIT()
00336         // LED_ON(led), where led = 1-3
00337         // Needs code programmed into Mega3290 to work!!
00338         // RAVEN only has one LED - so we never check which one... should do that probably
00339         #define LED_ON(led)
00340         #define LED_OFF(led)
00341 
00342         // Button macros - needs code programmed into Mega3290 to work!!
00343         #define BUTTON_SETUP()
00344         #define BUTTON_PRESSED() 0
00345

00347 /* Spitfire (small) PCB */
00348 #elif PLATFORM==SPITFIRE
00349 
00350         #if (!defined(__AVR_ATmega328P__) && !defined(__AVR_ATmega168P__))
00351                 #error "Incorrect MCU for Platform! Check Makefile"
00352         #endif
00353 
00354         #   define SSPORT     B
00355         #   define SSPIN      (0x02)
00356         #   define SPIPORT    B
00357         #   define MOSIPIN    (0x03)
00358         #   define MISOPIN    (0x04)
00359         #   define SCKPIN     (0x05)
00360         #   define RSTPORT    B
00361         #   define RSTPIN     (0x01)
00362         #   define SLPTRPORT  D
00363         #   define SLPTRPIN   (0x04)
00364         #   define USART
00365         #   define TICKTIMER  1
00366         #   define RADIO_VECT PCINT0_vect
00367         #   define HAL_ENABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) PCICR |= (1<<0), PCMSK0 |= (1<<0)
00368         #   define HAL_DISABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) PCMSK0 &= ~(1<<0)
00369         #   define HAL_INIT_ADC()  ADMUX = 0x47, ADCSRA = 0x80
00370         #   define HAL_STOP_ADC()  ADCSRA &= ~0x80
00371         #   define HAL_SAMPLE_ADC() ADCSRA |= (1 << ADSC)
00372         #   define HAL_WAIT_ADC() while (!(ADCSRA & (1<<ADIF))) {;}; ADCSRA |= (1<<ADIF)
00373         #   define HAL_READ_ADC() ADC
00374         #   define BAND BAND900
00375 
00376 #define PD7 7
00377 
00378         // LED Macros
00379         #define LED_INIT()             DDRD |= (1 << PD7), PORTD |= (1 << PD7)
00380         // LED_ON(led), where led doesn't matter - there is only one LED on the board.
00381         #define LED_ON(led)            DDRD |= (1 << PD7), PORTD &= !(1 << PD7)
00382         #define LED_OFF(led)           DDRD &= ~(1 << PD7), PORTD |= (1 << PD7)
00383 
00384         // Button macros (this platform has no button
00385         #define BUTTON_SETUP()
00386         #define BUTTON_PRESSED()        0
00387 
00388 /* Raven USB Stick */
00389 #elif PLATFORM==RAVENUSB
00390 
00391         #ifndef __AVR_AT90USB1287__
00392                 #error "Incorrect MCU for Platform! Check Makefile"
00393         #endif
00394 
00395         #   define SSPORT     B
00396         #   define SSPIN      (0x00)
00397         #   define SPIPORT    B
00398         #   define MOSIPIN    (0x02)
00399         #   define MISOPIN    (0x03)
00400         #   define SCKPIN     (0x01)
00401         #   define RSTPORT    B
00402         #   define RSTPIN     (0x05)
00403         #   define SLPTRPORT  B
00404         #   define SLPTRPIN   (0x04)
00405         #   define USART        1
00406         #   define TICKTIMER  3
00407         #   define RADIO_VECT TIMER1_CAPT_vect
00408         #   define HAL_ENABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) ( TIMSK1 |= ( 1 << ICIE1 ) ),  \
00409                         TCCR1B = HAL_TCCR1B_CONFIG,   /* Set clock prescaler */ \
00410                         TIFR1 |= (1 << ICF1)        /* Clear Input Capture Flag. */
00411         #   define HAL_DISABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) ( TIMSK1 &= ~( 1 << ICIE1 ), TCCR1B = 0 )
00412         #   define HAL_INIT_ADC()
00413         #   define HAL_STOP_ADC()
00414         #   define HAL_SAMPLE_ADC()
00415         #   define HAL_WAIT_ADC()
00416         #   define HAL_READ_ADC() 0
00417         #   define BAND BAND2400
00418 
00419         // Button macros (this platform has no button
00420         #define BUTTON_SETUP()
00421         #define BUTTON_PRESSED()        0
00422 
00423         // LED's for Raven USB
00424         #define Leds_init()                 (DDRD  |=  0xA0, DDRE  |=  0xC0)
00425         #define Leds_on()                   (PORTD |=  0x80, PORTD &= ~0x40, PORTE &=  ~0xC0)
00426         #define Leds_off()                  (PORTD &= ~0x80, PORTD |=  0x40, PORTE |=   0xC0)
00427         #define Led0_on()                   (PORTD |=  0x80)
00428         #define Led1_on()                   (PORTD &= ~0x20)
00429         #define Led2_on()                   (PORTE &= ~0x80)
00430         #define Led3_on()                   (PORTE &= ~0x40)
00431         #define Led0_off()                  (PORTD &= ~0x80)
00432         #define Led1_off()                  (PORTD |=  0x20)
00433         #define Led2_off()                  (PORTE |=  0x80)
00434         #define Led3_off()                  (PORTE |=  0x40)
00435         #define Led0_toggle()               (PIND |= 0x80)
00436         #define Led1_toggle()               (PIND |= 0x20)
00437         #define Led2_toggle()               (PINE |= 0x80)
00438         #define Led3_toggle()               (PINE |= 0x40)
00439 
00440         // LED Macros
00441         #define LED_INIT()                  Leds_init()
00442         // LED_ON(led), where led doesn't matter - there is only one LED on the board.
00443         #define LED_ON(led)                 Led0_on()
00444         #define LED_OFF(led)                Led0_off()
00445 
00446 /* ZIGBIT modules */
00447 #elif PLATFORM==ZIGBIT9 || PLATFORM==ZIGBIT24
00448 
00449         #ifndef __AVR_ATmega1281__
00450                 #error "Incorrect MCU for Platform! Check Makefile"
00451         #endif
00452 
00453         #   define SSPORT     B
00454         #   define SSPIN      (0x00)
00455         #   define SPIPORT    B
00456         #   define MOSIPIN    (0x02)
00457         #   define MISOPIN    (0x03)
00458         #   define SCKPIN     (0x01)
00459         #   define RSTPORT    A
00460         #   define RSTPIN     (0x07)
00461         #   define SLPTRPORT  B
00462         #   define SLPTRPIN   (0x04)
00463         #   define USART      1
00464         #   define TICKTIMER  3
00465         #   define RADIO_VECT INT5_vect
00466         #   define HAL_ENABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) EICRB |= 0x0C, EIMSK |= 0x20
00467         #   define HAL_DISABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) EICRB &= ~0x0C, EIMSK &= ~0x20
00468 
00469         #   define HAL_INIT_ADC()
00470         #   define HAL_STOP_ADC()
00471         #   define HAL_SAMPLE_ADC()
00472         #   define HAL_WAIT_ADC()
00473         #   define HAL_READ_ADC() 0
00474 
00475         // Button macros (PE6, needs pullup, short to gnd when pressed)
00476         #define BUTTON_SETUP()     (DDRE &= ~(1 << 6), PINE |= (1 << 6))
00477         #define BUTTON_PRESSED()   (!(PINE & (1 << 6)))
00478 
00479         // LED's for MESHBEAN USB
00480         // LED1 = PB5
00481         // LED2 = PB6
00482         // LED3 = PB7
00483         #define Leds_init()      (DDRB  |=  0xE0)
00484         #define Leds_on()        (PORTB |=  0x80)
00485         #define Leds_off()       (PORTB &= ~0xE0)
00486         #define Led0_on()
00487         #define Led1_on()        (PORTB |=  0x80)
00488         #define Led2_on()        (PORTB |=  0x40)
00489         #define Led3_on()        (PORTB |=  0x20)
00490         #define Led0_off()
00491         #define Led1_off()       (PORTB &= ~0x80)
00492         #define Led2_off()       (PORTB &= ~0x40)
00493         #define Led3_off()       (PORTB &= ~0x20)
00494         #define Led0_toggle()
00495         #define Led1_toggle()    (PINB  |= 0x80)
00496         #define Led2_toggle()    (PINB  |= 0x40)
00497         #define Led3_toggle()    (PINB  |= 0x20)
00498 
00499         // LED Macros
00500         #define LED_INIT()                  Leds_init()
00501         // LED_ON(led), where led doesn't matter - there is only one LED on the board.
00502         #define LED_ON(led)                 Led1_on()
00503         #define LED_OFF(led)                Led1_off()
00504 
00505         // Define which band we're operating in
00506         #if PLATFORM==ZIGBIT24
00507             #define BAND BAND2400
00508         #else
00509             #define BAND BAND900
00510         #endif
00511 
00512 /* TRT "button" board DSK001 */
00513 #elif PLATFORM==DSK001
00514 
00515         #ifndef __AVR_ATmega328P__
00516                 #error "Incorrect MCU for Platform! Check Makefile"
00517         #endif
00518 
00519         #   define SSPORT     B
00520         #   define SSPIN      (0x02)
00521         #   define SPIPORT    B
00522         #   define MOSIPIN    (0x03)
00523         #   define MISOPIN    (0x04)
00524         #   define SCKPIN     (0x05)
00525         #   define RSTPORT    C
00526         #   define RSTPIN     (0x05)
00527         #   define SLPTRPORT  C
00528         #   define SLPTRPIN   (0x04)
00529         #   define USART      0
00530         #   define TICKTIMER  1
00531         #   define RADIO_VECT PCINT0_vect
00532         #   define HAL_ENABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) PCICR |= (1 << PCIE0), PCMSK0 |= (1 << PCINT1)
00533         #   define HAL_DISABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( ) PCMSK0 &= ~(1 << PCINT1)
00534 
00535         #   define HAL_INIT_ADC()    ADMUX = 0xc8, ADCSRA = (1 << ADEN) | (1<<ADPS1) | (1<<ADPS2)
00536         #   define HAL_STOP_ADC()    ADMUX = 0x0F, ADCSRA = 1<<ADIF
00537         #   define HAL_SAMPLE_ADC()  ADCSRA |= (1 << ADSC) | (1 << ADIF)
00538         #   define HAL_WAIT_ADC()    while (!(ADCSRA & (1<<ADIF))) {;}; ADCSRA |= (1<<ADIF)
00539         #   define HAL_READ_ADC()    ADC
00540 
00541         #   define HAL_SELECT_ACCELZ()   ADMUX = (ADMUX & 0xF0) | 0x02
00542         #   define HAL_SELECT_ACCELY()   ADMUX = (ADMUX & 0xF0) | 0x01
00543         #   define HAL_SELECT_ACCELX()   ADMUX = (ADMUX & 0xF0) | 0x00
00544 
00545         #   define HAL_ACCEL_INIT()      DDRC = (DDRC & 0xf0) | (1<<3), PORTC &= 0xf0;
00546         #   define HAL_ACCEL_ON()        PORTC |= 1<<3
00547         #   define HAL_ACCEL_OFF()       PORTC &= ~(1<<3)
00548 
00549 
00550         // Button macros (no button on this platform)
00551         #define BUTTON_SETUP()
00552         #define BUTTON_PRESSED()  0
00553 
00554         // LED is on Port D Pin 7
00555         #define Leds_init()   //   (DDRD  |=  0x80, PORTD &= ~0x80)
00556         #define Leds_on()   (DDRD  |=  0x80, PORTD &= ~0x80)
00557         #define Leds_off()  (DDRD  &=  ~0x80)
00558         #define Led0_on()   (DDRD  |=  0x80, PORTD &= ~0x80)
00559         #define Led1_on()   (DDRD  |=  0x80, PORTD &= ~0x80)
00560         #define Led2_on()   (DDRD  |=  0x80, PORTD &= ~0x80)
00561         #define Led3_on()   (DDRD  |=  0x80, PORTD &= ~0x80)
00562         #define Led0_off()  (DDRD  &=  ~0x80)
00563         #define Led1_off()  (DDRD  &=  ~0x80)
00564         #define Led2_off()  (DDRD  &=  ~0x80)
00565         #define Led3_off()  (DDRD  &=  ~0x80)
00566         #define Led0_toggle() DDRD = DDRD ^ 0x80)
00567         #define Led1_toggle()  DDRD = DDRD ^ 0x80
00568         #define Led2_toggle()  DDRD = DDRD ^ 0x80
00569         #define Led3_toggle()  DDRD = DDRD ^ 0x80
00570 
00571         // LED Macros
00572         #define LED_INIT()                  Leds_init()
00573         // LED_ON(led), where led doesn't matter - there is only one LED on the board.
00574         #define LED_ON(led)                 Led1_on()
00575         #define LED_OFF(led)                Led1_off()
00576 
00577         // Define which band we're operating in
00578         #define BAND BAND2400
00579 #else
00580         #error PLATFORM undefined or incorrect value
00581 #endif
00582 
00583 #if BAND == BAND2400
00584 #include "at86rf23x_registermap.h"
00585 #elif BAND == BAND900
00586 #include "at86rf212_registermap.h"
00587 #else
00588 #error "BAND Undefined!"
00589 #endif

00637 #define SLP_TR                SLPTRPIN            
00638 #define DDR_SLP_TR            DDR( SLPTRPORT )    
00639 #define PORT_SLP_TR           PORT( SLPTRPORT )   
00640 #define PIN_SLP_TR            PIN( SLPTRPORT )    
00641 #define hal_set_slptr_high( ) ( PORT_SLP_TR |= ( 1 << SLP_TR ) )      
00642 #define hal_set_slptr_low( )  ( PORT_SLP_TR &= ~( 1 << SLP_TR ) )     
00643 #define hal_get_slptr( ) (    ( PIN_SLP_TR & ( 1 << SLP_TR ) ) >> SLP_TR )  
00644 #define RST                   RSTPIN              
00645 #define DDR_RST               DDR( RSTPORT )      
00646 #define PORT_RST              PORT( RSTPORT )     
00647 #define PIN_RST               PIN( RSTPORT )      
00648 #define hal_set_rst_high( )   ( PORT_RST |= ( 1 << RST ) )  
00649 #define hal_set_rst_low( )    ( PORT_RST &= ~( 1 << RST ) ) 
00650 #define hal_get_rst( )        ( ( PIN_RST & ( 1 << RST )  ) >> RST )  
00651 //#define HAL_SS_PIN            SSPIN               
00652 #define HAL_PORT_SPI          PORT( SPIPORT )     
00653 #define HAL_DDR_SPI           DDR( SPIPORT )      
00654 #define HAL_DD_SS             SSPIN               
00655 #define HAL_DD_SCK            SCKPIN              
00656 #define HAL_DD_MOSI           MOSIPIN             
00657 #define HAL_DD_MISO           MISOPIN             
00658 #define HAL_PORT_SS           PORT(SSPORT)
00659 #define HAL_DDR_SS            DDR(SSPORT)
00660 #define HAL_SS_HIGH( ) (PORT(SSPORT) |=  ( 1 << SSPIN )) 
00661 #define HAL_SS_LOW( )  (PORT(SSPORT) &= ~( 1 << SSPIN ))

00684 #define INIT_RCB_BB()  DDRC  |= (1 << PC4)|(1 << PC6)|(1 << PC7), \
00685         PORTC |= (1 << PC7), PORTC &= ~((1 << PC4)|(1 << PC6))

00696 #if ( F_CPU == 16000000UL )
00697     #define HAL_TCCR1B_CONFIG ( ( 1 << ICES1 ) | ( 1 << CS12 ) )
00698     #define HAL_US_PER_SYMBOL ( 1 )
00699     #define HAL_SYMBOL_MASK   ( 0xFFFFffff )
00700 #elif ( F_CPU == 8000000UL )
00701     #define HAL_TCCR1B_CONFIG ( ( 1 << ICES1 ) | ( 1 << CS11 ) | ( 1 << CS10 ) )
00702     #define HAL_US_PER_SYMBOL ( 2 )
00703     #define HAL_SYMBOL_MASK   ( 0x7FFFffff )
00704 #elif ( F_CPU == 4000000UL )
00705     #define HAL_TCCR1B_CONFIG ( ( 1 << ICES1 ) | ( 1 << CS11 ) | ( 1 << CS10 ) )
00706     #define HAL_US_PER_SYMBOL ( 1 )
00707     #define HAL_SYMBOL_MASK   ( 0xFFFFffff )
00708 #elif ( F_CPU == 2000000UL )
00709     #define HAL_TCCR1B_CONFIG ( ( 1 << ICES1 ) | ( 1 << CS11 ) )
00710     #define HAL_US_PER_SYMBOL ( 2 )
00711     #define HAL_SYMBOL_MASK   ( 0x7FFFffff )
00712 #elif ( F_CPU == 1000000UL )
00713     #define HAL_TCCR1B_CONFIG ( ( 1 << ICES1 ) | ( 1 << CS11 ) )
00714     #define HAL_US_PER_SYMBOL ( 2 )
00715     #define HAL_SYMBOL_MASK   ( 0x7FFFffff )
00716 #else
00717     #error "Clock speed not supported."
00718 #endif

00729 // Debugging macros
00730 #if DEBUG && SERIAL
00731 #include "serial.h"
00732 #define debugMsgChr(c) serial_putchar(c)
00733 #define debugMsgStr(s) serial_puts((char *)s)
00734 #define debugMsgFlt(n) sprintf(debugStr,"%f",n), serial_puts(debugStr)
00735 #define debugMsgInt(i) sprintf(debugStr,"%d",i), serial_puts(debugStr)
00736 #define debugMsgHex(x) sprintf(debugStr,"%x",x), serial_puts(debugStr)
00737 #define debugMsgCrLf() serial_puts("\r\n")
00738 #elif DEBUG && OTA_DEBUG
00739 #define otaDebugMsg(s,a) sprintf(debugStr,s,a);   \
00740     macOtaDebugRequest((u8*)debugStr);
00741 #define otaDebugMsg0(s) sprintf(debugStr,s);   \
00742     macOtaDebugRequest((u8*)debugStr);
00743 #define debugMsgChr(c) otaDebugMsg("%c", c)
00744 #define debugMsgStr(s) otaDebugMsg("%s", s)
00745 #define debugMsgFlt(n) otaDebugMsg("%f", n)
00746 #define debugMsgInt(i) otaDebugMsg("%d",i)
00747 #define debugMsgHex(x) otaDebugMsg("%x",x)
00748 #define debugMsgCrLf() otaDebugMsg0("\r\n")
00749 #else
00750 #define debugMsgChr(c)
00751 #define debugMsgStr(s)
00752 #define debugMsgFlt(n)
00753 #define debugMsgInt(i)
00754 #define debugMsgHex(x)
00755 #define debugMsgCrLf()
00756 #endif
00757 
00758 // Macros used to ensure compatibility with ARM code
00759 // ARM is a 32-bit machine, so it needs to declare a
00760 // temporary variable, which is guaranted to be on a
00761 // 32-bit boundary.  The AVR should not declare the
00762 // temporary variable because it eats up a lot of flash
00763 // and isn't required for AVR.
00764 #define  DECLARE64(x)
00765 #define  USE64(x) ((u64*)&x)

00771 #define hal_disable_trx_interrupt( ) HAL_DISABLE_RADIO_INTERRUPT( )

00779 #define HAL_TRX_END_MASK       ( 0x08 ) 
00780 #define HAL_ED_READY_MASK      ( 0x10 ) 
00781 #define HAL_TRX_UR_MASK        ( 0x40 ) 
00782 #define HAL_BAT_LOW_MASK       ( 0x80 )
